mapper.sql: `dict_code` AS `dictCode`, `dict_sort` AS `dictSort`, `dict_label` AS `dictLabel`, `dict_value` AS `dictValue`, `dict_type` AS `dictType`, `css_class` AS `cssClass`, `list_class` AS `listClass`, `is_default` AS `isDefault`, `status` AS `status`, `create_by` AS `createBy`, `create_time` AS `createTime`, `update_by` AS `updateBy`, `update_time` AS `updateTime`, `remark` AS `remark`
